sections.heading: and highways; use.A city or village constructing a viaduct or subway as provided in sections 18-617 to 18-636 may appropriate any existing street or highway therefor and may acquire, extend, widen, or enlarge any street or highway for such purpose

18-626.Streets and highways; use.

A city or village constructing a viaduct or subway as provided in sections 18-617 to 18-636 may appropriate any existing street or highway therefor and may acquire, extend, widen, or enlarge any street or highway for such purpose.

SourceLaws 1949, c. 28, ยง 8, p. 107;Laws 2021, LB163, ยง 61.
